Posts.EditableText: This is a new forum for discussing Squiffy https://github.com/textadventures/squiffy Whether you need help using it, want to discuss ideas for how it should work, or want to help with developing it, this is the place!
Posts.HTML:
This is a new forum for discussing Squiffy https://github.com/textadventures/squiffy

Whether you need help using it, want to discuss ideas for how it should work, or want to help with developing it, this is the place!
